title: I have updated my Pixel 3 XL to The latest update. Literally, ruined my phone
content:
The update ruined my phone
The settings has been reset like a new phone
Even though it kept all applications
I can't use home button to close the apps or running Google assistant, but I still can use the back button
There is no settings, I can't find settings anywhere

All of that happened when I updated my phone, it restarted and that happened after the restart
